contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|New Yorker}} '''New Yorker''' may refer to: * Resident of [[New York City]] * Resident of [[New York]] state * ''[[The New Yorker]]'', a magazine * ''The New Yorker'', 1833-41 predecessor to the ''[[New-York Tribune]]'' * [[Chrysler New Yorker]], an automobile * [[New Yorker Hotel]] * [[NewYorker]], a German fashion company * Any one of three [[List of named passenger trains of the United States (N-R)|named passenger trains of the United States]] ==See also== * ''[[The New Yorkers]]'', a musical by Cole Porter {{disambig}}
